result.eng: Freedom of movement within the European Union.
result.html: saorghluaiseacht laistigh den aontas eorpachFreedom of movement within the European Union.
result.ponchtml: saorġluaiseaċt laistiġ den aontas eorpaċFreedom of movement within the European Union.

result.eng: The country is outside the European Union.
result.ga: tá an tír taobh amuigh den aontas eorpach
result.orig: tá an tír taobh amuigh den aontas eorpach
result.html: tá an tír taobh amuigh den aontas eorpachThe country is outside the European Union.
result.ponchtml: tá an tír taoḃ amuiġ den aontas eorpaċThe country is outside the European Union.

result.eng: We are subject to obligations by virtue of our membership in the European Union.
result.ga: leagtar dualgais orainn go reachtúil de bhua ár mballraíochta san aontas eorpach
result.orig: leagtar dualgais orainn go reachtúil de bhua ár mballraíochta san aontas eorpach
result.html: leagtar dualgais orainn go reachtúil de bhua ár mballraíochta san aontas eorpachWe are subject to obligations by virtue of our membership in the European Union.
result.ponchtml: leagtar dualgais orainn go reaċtúil de ḃua ár mballraíoċta san aontas eorpaċWe are subject to obligations by virtue of our membership in the European Union.

result.eng: She came to America before the fall of the Soviet Union.
result.ga: tháinig sí go meiriceá roimh thitim an aontais shóivéadaigh
result.orig: tháinig sí go meiriceá roimh thitim an aontais shóivéadaigh
result.html: tháinig sí go meiriceá roimh thitim an aontais shóivéadaighShe came to America before the fall of the Soviet Union.
result.ponchtml: ṫáinig sí go meiriceá roiṁ ṫitim an aontais ẛóivéadaiġShe came to America before the fall of the Soviet Union.

result.eng: As the country spread out west, more states joined the union that did not accept slavery.
result.ga: mar a leath an tír siar amach tháinig níos mó stáit isteach san aontacht nár ghlac le sclábhaíocht
result.orig: mar a leath an tír siar amach tháinig níos mó stáit isteach san aontacht nár ghlac le sclábhaíocht
result.html: mar a leath an tír siar amach tháinig níos mó stáit isteach san aontacht nár ghlac le sclábhaíochtAs the country spread out west, more states joined the union that did not accept slavery.
result.ponchtml: mar a leaṫ an tír siar amaċ ṫáinig níos mó stáit isteaċ san aontaċt nár ġlac le scláḃaíoċtAs the country spread out west, more states joined the union that did not accept slavery.
